participant_1.background:
I'm from the Midwest, where meat and potatoes are king.
i have a cat named leela.
i own a custom upholstery shop.
I am a genius, but my parents have no idea about my hobby.
i am 29 years old.

participant_2.background:
I think of silly nicknames for my older brother, and then I start to wonder if people are thinking nice things about him when they hear them.
I like to dress up to impress, but comfort is the key to my happiness.
I'm looking for a new place to live that is close to my favorite fishing spot.
I'm learning to swim and I'm doing my best.
i want people to think i m cool.

content.text: Not much, just got done with a swim practice. How about you?
I am good. I just got off work. I own a custom upholstery shop.
Oh, that sounds cool. Do you like it?
Yeah, I love it. I get to work with my hands and make things.
That's awesome. What's the strangest thing you've ever upholstered?
I've upholstered everything from furniture to car seats. I even upholstered a boat once.
Wow, that's crazy. I bet you've seen some interesting things.
Yeah, I have. I've seen people do some crazy things with upholstery.
What's your favorite thing to upholster?
I like to upholster furniture. It's the most challenging and rewarding.
That makes sense. I'm sure it's a lot of work, but it must be really satisfying to see your finished product.
It is. I love seeing the end result of my work.
I bet. Well, it sounds like you have a really cool job.
Thanks! I do. I love it
